titleStmt.title: Ezekiel's prophesie parallel'd: or, The desire of the eyes taken away Delivered in a sermon, preach'd at the funerals of the most virtuous Mrs Elizabeth Cole, wife to Robert Cole Esquire, at Wye in Kent, Nov. 26. MDCLI. By Samuel Barnard, Doctor in Divinity.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Samuel, 1590 or 91-1657.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
